channel.title: Moderators, Please Read!
channel.description:
As many people think moparscape and private servers are crap, I also do but i still hang out here and help, I see massive spamming when ikiliki is gone, taharok has been on mitb for a while, silab, i have seen her a few times, But this is crazy. I try to report this stuff to the un-named and crap but they think its cool to hide there online status, ITS NOT, this is so annoying, people taking advantage when mods arent on but then again, we try to report and we dont know who to pm!
Please read this and do something about it..
thanks, Frell
NOTE: This was originally posted in general discussion but ikiliki locked it and said post it here. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,172697.0.html

item.title: Moderators, Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:16, topic:122981”][quote author=Mod Taharok link=topic=172716.msg1595920#msg1595920 date=1184398714]
I didn’t see that anywhere. And it would have been easier for Ikiliki to move it here. But, whatever. Doesn’t matter.
[/quote]
Nah that thread was already full of spam.

  • I had to sleep so I had no time to clean the topic from all those pages lol.
    This is better.

When I’m back from my holidays I will ask an Administrator to reset te Report section.
My browser went crazy cause of all the pages.

If people PM me to report things I will listen to it first anyways.
Most of the time thats more important.[/quote]

Ya, probably will be best for it to be reset during the board reset. Whatever works best guess.

Read full topic

item.title: Moderators, Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Mod Taharok:

I didn’t see that anywhere. And it would have been easier for Ikiliki to move it here. But, whatever. Doesn’t matter.

Nah that thread was already full of spam.

  • I had to sleep so I had no time to clean the topic from all those pages lol.
    This is better.

When I’m back from my holidays I will ask an Administrator to reset te Report section.
My browser went crazy cause of all the pages.

If people PM me to report things I will listen to it first anyways.
Most of the time thats more important.

Read full topic

item.title: Moderators, Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

No, it creates a topic in a special section that moderators can see. They then solve reports at a time of their choosing.

Read full topic

lothy:

Use the ‘Report to moderator’ link like every other member does.

that sends it to there email

item.title: Moderators, Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:7, topic:122981”]I think mods would get a bit upset if they get a hell load of pm’s on reports.
I find it fun to guess which mod is on when they’re hidden.
You could just post to stop spam or w/e.
Eventually they’ll flame and get themselves banned :P[/quote]

I would rather take report pms than post pms.

Frell, didn’t you post this on moparscape already?

Read full topic

item.title: Moderators, Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I send about 50 a day, random crap to guess which mod is online.

Edit:
Well not always, some are questions where I have no clue, others are to friends.

Read full topic

item.title: Moderators, Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Frell:

I try to report this stuff to the un-named and crap but they think its cool to hide there online status

No, we hide our online status because of stupid and ANNOYING PMs. Let me post some here:

coder no0b:

erm im sorry…can i be unmuted but warned pleasE?

owned ur ass:

Can u give me a registration code i cant find one

die or no:

HEY :mad: :mad: :mad: i recorve like 999999999999 warning for nothing i do nothing it exe don’t stop make my angry Warn him stop warn my for nothing :@

[quote=“Casey.”]Can I post this…
If I can where?

It’s like a knock off a linux for vista, allows you to have 4 screens, I guess you’d call them, open at once.[/quote]

sanga282:

are you mates with pwnd by any chance? like are you connected to him in any other way than Mopar?

99 stats owns:

Hi, do you mind if I interview you for my forums?

Read full topic

item.title: Moderators, Please Read!

I think mods would get a bit upset if they get a hell load of pm’s on reports.
I find it fun to guess which mod is on when they’re hidden.
You could just post to stop spam or w/e.
Eventually they’ll flame and get themselves banned
